attributes.action: demonstrate his solidarity with the taxpayers of this country by undertaking to guarantee that MPs and peers of the realm who are accused of theft or fraud in respect of their expenses claims are barred from using those same expense accounts or the legal aid fund to pay their defence lawyers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These people, if convicted, will be proven to have stolen from the taxpayer.  It would be grossly immoral, therefore, for them to be allowed to charge their defence costs to their expenses, or for them to be allowed access to the legal aid fund (access to which is denied any standard rate taxpayer by virtue of the very fact they are paid enough to be liable to pay income tax!) thereby stealing from the taxpayer again!  It is important that our Prime Minister distance himself from criminal activity and prohibits the use of ANY taxpayer pounds to fund any defence mounted by the accused.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
